channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This High Arctic rhino may change what we know about ancient animal migrations
item.description: A 23-million-year-old rhinoceros fossil is reshaping scientists' understanding of mammal evolution.

item.title: Vern Yip's secret to better home decor? Stop scrolling for inspiration
item.description: In the digital age, it's easy to curate the look of your home with the help of artificial intelligence and social media. But designer Vern Yip would l...

item.title: Ilhan Omar says Trump attacks on Somali immigrants 'deflect attention' from scrutiny
item.description: NPR's Michel Martin speaks with Rep. Ilhan Omar, D-Minn., who came to the U.S. from Somalia, about President Trump's tirade against Somali immigrants.

item.title: FBI arrests suspect in investigation into pipe bombs planted near DNC, RNC before Jan. 6 attack

item.title: Trump attacks Somali immigrants. And, CDC to address vaccine schedule for kids

item.title: Spotify says Wrapped 2025 is its biggest yet, with 200M+ users in its first day
item.description: After last year's flop, Spotify Wrapped engagement is up 19% and shares were up 41%, the company says.

item.title: Anthropic signs $200M deal to bring its LLMs to Snowflake’s customers
item.description: AI research lab Anthropic inked a $200 million deal with Snowflake to bring its AI models to Snowflake's 12,600 customers.

item.title: Nexus isn’t going all-in on AI, keeping half of its new $700M fund for India startups
item.description: Nexus Venture Partners manages $3.2 billion in capital across its funds and has invested in more than 130 companies over the years.

item.title: EU investigating Meta over policy change that bans rival AI chatbots from WhatsApp

item.title: AI finds its way into Apple’s top apps of the year
item.description: Although Apple has continued to avoid naming a dedicated AI app or AI chatbot as its app of the year, AI was showcased among this year's winners.
